Name: Richard G
Title: long time ago but India ia always facinating
Review: A wonderful Country and I have been from North and South and East and West. Food is good and People are very friendly. Contrast between say Chenai and Delhi makes it even more worthwhile. I also have been to Leh and to Mumbai.

Name: Ravikesh P- Fiji
Title: Good shopping experience
Review: It was very ideally located as we stayed at the Grand Chennai by GRT. As the place is well known for its shopping it was a great experience as the whole street, Sir Thayagarya Road, T Nagar is full of shops.  Apart from main streets, there are smaller streets that also has shops. As it is a famous place for shopping, shop owners take full advantage and things are very expensive. Prices are same or more expensive than the shopping malls like express mall. Communication can be a problem as salespeople do not speak fluent english. Hindi too can be a problem.  Another drawback is the constant negging by the street dwellers who are either begging or selling things which they insist you to buy. Not many clean eateries except for some big restaurants like A2B and Balaji. KFC is also available.

Name: Hooray H
Title: Cleanest shopping street in India
Review: Lots of shops, well organised & busy.We went into an amazing shop full of stainless steel products of mediocre quality but very inexpensive.Fun

Name: TravelTime
Title: Lot of shops
Review: There are lot of shops to choose from with varied prices, you can get items starting from 5 rupees. Pondy bazaar is in TNagar, it is a huge street. Parking is little difficult to get during weekends especially for cars, but well organized parking throughout the area. There are lot of items to choose from based on your budget, this is heaven for girls for sure......

Name: PitoyAmpil1941
Title: Phoenix Mall at Velachery Main road
Review: the place was big, huge n large.... n very expensive..... with a 65 US dollar standard room price at Design Hotel...... one has to enter the hotel from the mall entrance....

Name: KARTHIKb87
Title: Chennai busiest Market area
Review: Pondy bazaar is chennai's one of busiest Market area since long time. Its had busiest road and lot of shops to purchase. Recently Govt made Pedestrain plaza in Pondy bazaar as part of smart city project with wider foot paths , automated parking, lot of fountains, decorated trees etc.,

Name: discerning24
Title: Amazing shopping strip
Review: We enjoyed the bargains, the ambience and the range of 'name' shops and local bazaars. The street has been made pedestrian friendly, a rarlty in this city of aggressive motorists. It is quiet with trees lining it and places to sit. Thoroughly recommended for your visit to Chennai.

Name: SAAGOBAA
Title: SAREE SARI SAREE
Review: If you want best saree with best quality and great look with budget cost then this is place to explore it and buy. they have from A to Z types of sarees available .

Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: üéÅüõçÔ∏è
Review: the newly renovated and one of the most shopping destination and busiest hub... not even only shopping including food and WiFi accessable around the street ... the best for relaxation and hangout with kids and friends

Name: tsk0101
Title: A must visit place in Chennai
Review: It is one of the busiest places in Chennai with a lot of shopping centres and shops for almost anything you want.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: For Anything And Everything - Pondi Bazar
Review: Pondibazar is one of the best places in Chennai for shopping. The flee market is very reasonable. One more thing that is good about this place is its not too conjusted like T Nagar. That's why I prefer Pondi Bazar T Nagar. You have everything available here from fro. You flowers, footwear, clothes, toys and what not. Everything is available here.

Name: FaisalShb
Title: A happening place
Review: Quite busy but lots of options for local shopping. Seems like a popular place among the locals and some tourists.

Name: plantablok
Title: Shopping
Review: Very busy street but convenient and easily accessible from the hotel GRT Grand. Very exciting to walk through and department stores , local shops and restaurants offer excellent choices. This is a must for tourist visitig Tamil Nadu

Name: KathiraveluG
Title: Shopping
Review: One of the famous street for shopping. Convenience store to clothing to departmental stores to restaurants. Pleasant to walk along for window shopping as well.

Name: buddy_2564
Title: Lots of shopping option
Review: Very close T Nagar so if you are planning for shopping, it might take you all day as I found out. Lots of choices but do haggle as it is a must in some place.

Name: Deadman17
Title: Main market place
Review: This is one of the busiest shopping places in the whole of Chennai. One can buy good quality stuff, at good rates, especially if you are looking to buy in bulk. The area is usually crowded and one should go in the afternoon to avoid the rush.

Name: flying_girl_iya
Title: Shooping TOP
Review: You got a lot of little merchant at affordable prices you can deal with them a bit and you will pay less :)

Name: kamalakaran
Title: shopping place
Review: good to buy things like kithenware. i bought electric chappati maker.can buy ever silver things too.i bought preethi grinder there.

Name: balkivinod
Title: Heart of Chennai
Review: The location is famous for shopping.  You can find sarees and jewellery shop at pangal park. And dress material shops at pondy bazar are famous like naidu hall, flora etc.However the location is crowded in the evening and during festival timw. The traffic can be regulated, but still congested and need to think about parking before visiting as sometimes you need to walk

Name: Meezanur R
Title: Shop at chennai with tourist feel
Review: It‚Äôs a nice market place where you find some good brands and some local brands in clothing, toys, and home appliances. Enjoy shopping

Name: Wanderer
Title: Chennai high profile shopping district
Review: Pondy Bazaar is renowned as a shoppers paradise. Almost all brands of apparels  are available in the high street. Unbranded accessories stuff also available at Pondy Bazaar foot path merchant complex. Even garlands of lovely flowers are readily available for adorning couples to be married, and also for decorating our gods. It also has a number of large variety of jewelery shops for you to choose from.

Name: Zinia F
Title: Street market gem
Review: I go there for the jewelleries! Not the best finish though as one of my earrings broke off right after buying it and by then I already had come home so couldn't do the change, but overall the designs are great and the price is really cheap with the right bargain skills!

Name: Narendran J
Title: Nice to experience the atmosphere
Review: I will recommend to visit this place if you are looking for cheap and bargain goods. Many of the shops in this area offer beautiful Indian traditional clothes, right from kurti tops for ladies to children clothes but do not expect high quality stuff as this place caters more to the locals who are looking to buy knock-offs.

Name: Tina
Title: large variety
Review: Here you have such a big variety of products that you are hardly able to know what to take, and from whom! the prices are very good and competitive!

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Shopping hub of the city
Review: The place is another ancient locality of the city which is now the shopping hub of the chennaites.the places is so crowded and connected with the huge traffic that makes the shopping a hectic task around.

Name: Shaji Joseph
Title: place of shopping
Review: This is a place good for shopping. The most of the main famous are located to this place, you can also enjoy including the street purchase too.  A guest will get every thing over here but it is a crowded place. All main shops have there own parking place, also corportion is also maintaining some parking space on paid bass

Name: Narasimhan G
Title: Gold by History !!
Review: This connects T Nagar chennai to Anna salai chennaithe cinema theatres  were long demolishedBig bazaar is doin goodGarlands are reasonably priced .more choices are available

Name: Val A
Title: GREAT SHOPPING
Review: This area is really good for best quality shopping with reasonable prices.  There are a good few malls in the area as well. Eating outlets plentiful. Great value for money and lots of good choices of shops and food varieties

Name: Debasmitaghosh
Title: Shop to your heart's content
Review: Recently went to Chennai with my husband after 10 years. We had started our married life in Chennai 10 years ago so there was a lot of nostalgia attached to this trip. Hubby had work so I stepped out solo for a walk down Pondy Bazaar, one of my favourite places to shop in Chennai. It was around 12 in the afternoon, the February sun was pleasant, and I instantly felt at home under the canopy of trees that Pondy Bazaar is known for. I started off by buying a gajra for myself for 20 bucks from a street-side shop selling flowers and garlands. Got into the Chennai feel once I put the gajra on my hair. Walked a bit and stopped by this shop called Choices selling cut pieces for garments. The collection was huge, and an array of colours mesmerised me. I bought a few blouse pieces to gift my mother and mom-in-law. The prices were pretty reasonable, and I was in fact amazed that I got such a good deal. I came out of the shop happy and started walking again. There were shops lined up selling every pretty thing from copper-goldplated jewellery starting from Rs 800 to kurtas and bags priced Rs 200 onwards. I'm between there were small joints selling corn and coconut pudding. I stopped by one Amma selling fresh coconut water. At Rs 40 it was worth the price. The water was sweet and I felt satiated after a long walk in the sun. My next stop was Rathna Stores that sells everything, right from utensils to furniture. One tends to get lost inside this shop, the variety is so much. I felt excited walking in here after 10 years! Bought a few steel bowls and a couple of copper-bottom steel saucepans. Felt like buying the entire shop though. If you happen to come to Chennai, a visit to Pondy Bazaar, and most importantly Rathna Stores is a must! I walked down the entire street till I felt totally happy and done. Pondy Bazaar gives you that typical Chennai vibe, and it's always pleasant to come back here.

Name: Jennifer J
Title: A must visit shopping destination for all coming over to Chennai & those living here.
Review: This is the place where everyone can find something, they have been looking for or wanting to buy since long. Shopping is incomplete without a visit to Pondy Bazaar be it any time of the year. Kanchi plaza, Ratna Stores, Instore, are my favorites.

Name: Sundaram R
Title: recent visit to pondy bazaar
Review: the last months year end purchase experience in this popular location was really good and value based purse friendly.shops are for middle class who can enjoy and satisty their bargaining craving..a place not to be missed for casual and serious shopping

Name: Mark_Bay_64
Title: Not impressed, waist of time
Review: We went to Pondy Bazar with lots of enthusiasm only to find a the pavements more like an obstacle course. We struggled to enjoy or look at the shops for fear of falling into a hole or twisting our ankles. At the end of the road we could see the new pavements being laid which should look lovely when completed but till then be careful going there

Name: Anusuya D
Title: Place for shopping
Review: Highly crowded shopping area near t nagar. We can enjoy more snacks and bites, chats. So many big shopping shops and also small shops for bargaining is also available.

Name: TrailBlazer581787
Title: busy but worth a visit
Review: busy street but worth a visit. A bit crowded and for shopping you'll mainly find basic stuff. There's renovation work under way and the pavement is in part difficult to walk. For a chai or quick bite, use one of the side streets and not main street

Name: 1Jayanthi
Title: Fabulous shopping experience
Review: All the shopping biggies like Pothys, saravana stores, rathna stores etc are looked in this area. All food chains like murugan idli kadai, ponnusawmy etc are also located here. enjoyable shopping

Name: manoj k
Title: Best place to buy clothes
Review: Pondy Bazaar is best place to buy clothes of local brand. If you want to linen shirts you can buy from shop here. Cotton trouser and shirt can also be purchased here at very low price. Overall a good place for shopping clothes.

Name: Darshank
Title: Cheap shopping
Review: At pondy bazzar one can do shopping with lower price. Eating street foods while shopping i one of the best experience one can get here

Name: Ashish S
Title: Amazing place
Review: The place is amazing. Me and my friends enjoyed being there. Place was neat and clean and very well connected.

Name: edwinMalaysia
Title: A shoppers paradise
Review: Shopping in T Nagar must not be missed when in Chennai. Everything you want is available at this bazzar

Name: shivaraikod
Title: The local market
Review: Like every city has its own local market like Delhi has sarojini and Mumbai has one in lower parel this city has got pondy street market.

Name: MalcolmNicholas
Title: Shop till you Drop
Review: A carnival atmosphere each evening. The Shops are well stocked with a range of items and selection made so easy in the manner the goods are displayed. A fun-filled and enjoyable Shopping Experience.... with great bargains available.

Name: Swami1939
Title: ANY THINK YOU GET
Review: The Pondy Bazaar on Thyagaraya Road is a place where you can enjoy your shopping whatever may it be. Right from dresses, jewelry, household items, flowers, eateries,fancy items all are available in Bondy Bazaar.

Name: Reshma R
Title: Good place for shopping in Chennai
Review: You will get almost everything in pondy bazar. The green building near to bigbazar(there is a small restauarant in between) contains all cheap items but subject to bargaining. Many other shops are there on both sides of the road

Name: Traveloney
Title: All in one place
Review: You get everything you need in this street. The roadside shops have great collections of jewellery which comes in a good price upon bargain.

Name: worldwomantourist
Title: Road side shopping
Review: This is a best place for road side shopping. Variety of items are available here like footwears, dresses, fancy items and many more fashion products.

Name: Anusree P
Title: Budget shopping
Review: Like other streets in T nagar, this  is a shoppers area. you can buy items in cheap rate. But the quality wont be that great

Name: ZahiraAmeen
Title: Fun Street shopping
Review: Pondy bazaar has been revamped .. still its a shopper's paradise. Stand alone buildings carry both designer and budget items. Only problem is there are not enough eateries on this strip

Name: Siddhartha
Title: " A Must Visit for Budget Shopping"
Review: A Must visit for budget shopping  , has all the top retail clothing showroom's and one of the oldest utensil shop in Chennai. Has car parking , and access to the near by Natesan and Panagal Park  and the clothing chains and restaurant's.Also has one of the oldest hair dressing saloon's and pharmacy in this part of Chennai.A Must visit.

Name: vasan224
Title: one place for all things
Review: Pondy Bazaar, officially called Soundarapandian Angadi, is a market located in T. Nagar, Chennai. It is one of the principal shopping districts of Chennai.

Name: NickBaxendale
Title: Interesting
Review: Very busy interesting area with many shops selling different items. They also had street vendors in front of theshops selling fruit, costume jewellery etc. One of the older areas of Chennai (Madras) which I liked.

Name: Ghiri T
Title: A Busy Shopping Place
Review: Pondy bazaar is an old famous area for shopping which is near T.Nagar. This place is crowded all time and it is one of the busy place in Chennai.Here one can find all type of products and it is one of the good place for shopping.

Name: sridharan2013
Title: Central place for shoppers
Review: Pondy bazar is one of the old shopping areas of Chennai. A very busy street separates shops on either side of the road. Small stand alone shops to huge branded outlets can be found here in addition to eateries of all types. Shopping arcades are also available for those who prefer all shopping under single roof. This place is very close to leading textiles and jewellery outlets of T Nagar.

Name: reddi_traveller
Title: Pondy Bazaar
Review: Pondy Bazaar is famous for all the shopping only. it is near to TNagar area almost 600 meters from the main road. great place for offers and best dresses and antiques.

Name: krish509
Title: Long Street of Shopping!
Review: Very long street for shopping! Ideal for girls shopping. We entered Aurelia shop and the seller was very kind to adjust all dresses purchased by my gf within 30 minutes and free of charge.

Name: 1Jayanthi
Title: Must visit place in Chennai
Review: The shopping fistrict of cHennai is this place. Renganathan street and all famous shops like Saravana stores, Potheys, rathna stores, all are located here. All the famous restaurant chains like Saravana bhavan, A2B, Murugan idli kadai, Anjappar etc have outlets here.

Name: MariahManuel
Title: Great Shopping Location
Review: Great location that offers everything you could possibly be looking for from clothes to jewelry to antiques and even home appliances. There are money changers in the area with good rates. Famous saree shop Nalli's is walking distance. Pondy Bazaar is a must for all those looking to shop

Name: Jerod M
Title: Shopping choices.
Review: A nice selection of artisans and items for the tourist.  It was not crowed and we were able to browse. Vendors were friendly.

Name: JumboMumbai
Title: Get it all here
Review: We went to buy some fans and electricals for our new house.. had passed through the area when we moved into the city. but was pleasantly surprised by the variety of shops in the bazaar close to each other. Rathna Fan House is where our fist stop was and then we went to saravana Stores and that solved our needs totally.. fantastic experience.. also had a meal at Balaji and that was so good after a tiring shopping..

Name: Dr Javed Rasheed
Title: A Significant Shopping Destination
Review: Pondy Bazaar in T Nagar in Chennai is a very renowned place for shopping for clothes, Sarees, Utensils, As that‚Äôs the place where you get what you are looking for, the area is crowded with vendors, pavement encroachment by sellers who sell most of the cheap goods like purses, footwear, clothes, fruits and one can find beggars in plenty pestering the shoppers as they have the knack of identifying the locals and those who are from different national and international destinations especially the foreigners. One needs to be careful of pickpockets as some of them keep prowling there for an easy prey but on the brighter side shopping there can be a satisfying experience for those who go there to get what they want.Dr.Javed Rasheed

Name: psp
Title: more options
Review: one of my favorite place for shopping in chennai... u can get everything like dresses, curtains, fancy items, books, tops, bags etc at a very reasonable rate in road side shops... u have to bargain...full road was occupied by these shops on both the sides... i heard that now those shops were fully relocated to a particular complex in pondy bazaar itself...

Name: GLOBALSEAS
Title: shopping street
Review: shopping street we find every thing in this one street pondy bazaar , all nice restaurants , cheap shopping available on road side as well as in shops ..

Name: Dilshan M
Title: Evening shopping
Review: Most convenient time to shopping in this Street is in the evening. Shops are open from 10 am to 10 pm. There are every kind of shops all the way of the street. Little bit crowded

Name: Sandra NK
Title: Shopping  street.
Review: I love this place nice shopping street you can find almost every here. From dresses to food. Street good is amazing. Enjoyed a lovely madras coffee as well.

Name: spicyyy27
Title: What more could one ask for
Review: Loved the walks close to the Bazaar istelf.People around and in the area very friendly...lots of bargains and you need to have enough time to walk around and really see what you looking for.Lovely the deity jewellery stores around the area

Name: Rajasekhar M
Title: Walk in the evening
Review: Good place where you can shop for any thing and every thing. Ground the stores to gut the local and imported

Name: shrinikethv
Title: A-Z for cheap shopping
Review: Shopping zone in T Nagar. You name a product and you get it here in Pondy Bazar. The ambience isn't great and luxurious, but if you are good at bargaining, you can get very good products at very less rate here.

Name: krish862
Title: Very good place for shopping
Review: Without visiting pondy bazaar , one can't complete the Chennai sight seeing by out station people.It is one of the oldest and must visit street in t nagar, Oldest shops and famous is the family store by Naidu hall and nagesh theatre which converted into KALYANA MANDAPM and to the recently added Kalyan jewelry, apart from the oldest natesan park were some of the highlights of pondy bazaar.

Name: Punch-77
Title: Still maintains traditional values
Review: One of the few shopping zones in T.Nagar, which has not been subjected to high rise shopping malls and overcrowded parking centers.

Name: 674santha
Title: busy bazar
Review: very crowded always, all seasons all occasions. numerous shops wherein one can buy what all they want from cheap to high price depending upon their quality. famous shopping centre for bags utensils garments very colourful to go around just to kill the time for window shopping too.

Name: Balasubramanian R
Title: Chennai Pondy Bazaar
Review: Pondy Bazaar is one of the busiest area in Thyagarayanagar heart of chennai city. Hotels, Electical, Textile, vessel and other shops are there and rich people prefer to buy from these places.  Now road side hawkers/small shops are removed and the road is broad. Car parking facilities are available.

Name: vijmail99
Title: Enjoyed the shopping
Review: Worth the money for the shopping. Bit crowded but the traffic is well organized by the traffic police. The road side shops allows you to get things for the best deal.

Name: Lilian J
Title: Shopping spree
Review: So many things that you can buy. Bargain at roadside shops and grab good food, ice creams...fruits etc. Good shopping place for clothes, footwear etc.

Name: Mohamed F
Title: Nice
Review: I can buy all thing in one place what I need very crowd place be care full for your personal thing may be

Name: iftekhar ansari
Title: Good local market for shopping
Review: The market is good place for shopping, we can find from grocery to life style product in this market. specially i enjoy the tea in the local stall available in whole market.

Name: Kothandaraman P
Title: all for all
Review: we can purchase whatever we want at reasonable prices in small shops.we can bargain.we can select from clusters.best entertaining place to be visited with kids and family,for homely purchases.

Name: Aravindh R
Title: A nice place to do shopping all day!!
Review: Pondy Bazar is one of the busiest roads in chennai which is famous for shopping anything from pin to pistol.  You can find lots of branded outlets and also roadside shops where you can buy t shirt, ladies fancy items, flowers etc. There's nothing that you don't get here. This road is more famous for buying dress materials and readymades.

Name: s_ramsam
Title: Major shopping area
Review: Pndy Bazar is well known as on rhe major shopping areas of Chennai. Adjacent to T Nagar, the Panagal Park is also nearby. Parking space available in the park area. Very crowded locality only visit if shopping for something.

Name: twinkle906
Title: Get anything and everything ... from A To Z
Review: This is one of the oldest shopping areas of Chennai... Centrally located at T Nagar...Right from Flowers, garlands to Curtains.... everything available... Bargain and get the best price. Previously just 3 to 4 years back, the vendors were selling goods and articles on the platform pavements... Now the corporation had constructed a separate building wherein vendors have their shops... Organized one...On account of this, pedestrians can walk freely on the pavement and visit different shops...Adjustant and opposite to Pondy Bazaar, so many good hotels/ big shopping malls/textile shops etc are located...Unique place to visit for our shopping....

Name: Suresh B
Title: An Unique Place to Shop all Types of Goods With Cheaper Rates
Review: This is the Place always have Crowded. An Unique Place to Shop all Types of Goods With Cheaper Rates.

Name: Anusuya D
Title: crowded shopping area
Review: a very crowdy shopping area at t nagar. it is hub place of chennai for shopping with a lots of small shops. you can bargain at some shops. we can get cheaper to costlier product here.

Name: KRAMA200
Title: A Good Shopping Area
Review: This is one of the popular Shopping Areas of Chennai where you can get Jewellery ( Gold)  and Silk Sarees. The place has been spruced uip recently and is clean and devoid of Hawkers. Hawkers have moved away . But still patronized as it is difficult to buy ware they sell at their price,Certainly go for it. The shops here sell everything you need andin some shops bargaining is called for.We went for shopping on a Saturday afternoon and it was crowded. Go On week days and in the mornings as you will have time to choose and bargain.

Name: SRIKAKOLAPU
Title: crowded on weekends
Review: Since cost is less on many items it becomes crowded on weekends and bargaining is required at some of the hawkers and local language needs to be known for this for better deals

Name: samadhanamhopek
Title: TAMIL NADU MART 2017
Review: Fascinating street with a lot of small shops - you can get just about everything you looking for in this bazaarfriendly vendors, reasonable prices , you can bargain . variety of goods are sold here. Interesting visit.

Name: vijaycs11
Title: Ideal place for diwali shopping
Review: The variety in pondy bazaar is unmatched and I love to go this place for Diwali shopping. Had good choices and very happy at the end of the day. Recommended to go early morning by 9am to finish shopping by afternoon before the crowd arrives

Name: YatriForever
Title: Unless you have a reason to go here...
Review: This is definitely not a tourist attraction for the first time visitors to Chennai. This is just a market street with  hundreds of shops either side of the road teeming with thousands of people, almost all day. You don't go here unless you are looking for someone or something or some reason to be here. Not a must see attraction of Chennai.

Name: GrannyMaa
Title: Paradise for Shoppers
Review: Pondy Bazar is important locality in T.Nagar, famous for Shopping - Jewellery, Silk Sarees, Textiles, Gold, Ornaments and much more. During festival season, you will find so much crowd here and people are going shopping crazy.

Name: Dhanasekaran B
Title: shopping
Review: now this bazar is clean and tidy. pray the pavenent hawkers donot return back. can get anything if you have money here . you can bargain in some shops. moderate cost

Name: RoomA_Vanessa
Title: Discount friendly area
Review: Good shopping on the streets under the bridge. Though I must say most  sellers do not know English ..

Name: mahithaprasad19
Title: Once upon a time shopping experience
Review: Although the place is still good for a local shopping experience, used to be even better about 3 years back! Sad to see all the street shop vendors shifted to a complex now. Do not miss the tiffin at Balaji Bhavan for a mid shopping snack.

Name: Rucha121
Title: Crowded Shopping Market
Review: Ponday Bazar T.Nagar is the hub of shopping in Chennai.. from big a/c showrooms to street side hawkers, from pin to plane.. well not exactly.. you can get everything here.. bargaining is must. carry water.

Name: murthi
Title: The mecca of shopping!
Review: One will be spoilt for choice at the profusion of establishments that offer everything from diapers to diamonds, catering to the needs of all types of shoppers.Be prepared for massive crowds that can be overwhelming at times, especially during festive seasons.

Name: Arun
Title: Important place in T Nagar
Review: This place is a complete stretch of shops from low range to high range. You can find roadside shops where you can bargain and get products at a cheaper rate and there are many showrooms and big shops with branded products as well.

Name: Ra_Radha
Title: Shopping paradise
Review: T.Nagar - Pondy Bazar is shopper's paradise.. so many shops, showrooms, street-side hawkers selling variety of items from pin to gold jewellery to electronic item, sarees & textile showrooms and big multinational brands..

Name: Joji J
Title: "area where shopping can be done at cheap rates"
Review: Most people who visit Chennai visit Pondy Bazaar in T Nagar for purchasing.Cloth, Electronic items, curios, leather goods, momentos are comparatively very cheap and those who bargain will get items for very cheap rates. The area has many food outlets and Pondy Bazaar is the apt place for those who are in the look out for having variety of dishes. Fresh flowers, garlands etc for various occasions are also availible here. The area will be flooded with local and foreign tourists till mid night. One thing which we have to be careful is about replicas which is difficult to identify and once we purchase it is difficult to exchange.

Name: Praveen S
Title: one place for everything
Review: Pondy bazaar is in T Nagar, which has all level of items from kids to older ages with low budget price

Name: krishna p
Title: Good shopping spot
Review: This is good shopping spot in the city with all kinds of good in cheap and best price rates and need to grade our self the best quality and buy the products and all the variety of good available  in this T nagar which is adjacent to this pondy bazar

Name: B R S
Title: Shopper's Delight
Review: It's one of Chennai's Shopping Districts where Garments & Textiles, White Goods & Electronics, Mobile Phones. Footwear. Pots & Pans, Jewellery, Food Stuff & Home Needs, Flowers & Garlands  are available within an area of 3 Sq.km. There are several restaurants and eateries serving food to every taste. Tourists and Shoppers throng the pace from about 10.00am to Mid-night.

Name: Karthik V
Title: Pondy Bazaar
Review: Always the best for shopping, This pondy Bazaar as I mentioned before has all stores seeing all kinds of wares to dresses to just about anything. This time it was for dress. There is one shop Lal and co on this pondy bazaar road where they sell lovely dresses and my wife picked by a couple of sets of clothes . Price was nominal far better than the showrooms and the quality was at its best. Service was good. too.

Name: selvambikaiyali
Title: pondy bazar
Review: area where you will get all the items with nominal rates and will enjoy the snacks of different items

Name: Ponniveerappan
Title: Shopping Area
Review: We can find things like clothings , bangles , earings and all kind of jewelries . Price can reduce there. Too crowd.
